modName: PS Vanilla Follower Tweak Extension with In-Game Body Changer
summary:
Framework based on the SkyUI MCM interface extension to allow players to easily tweak damage intake/output, as well as, body change from 5 mesh slots with 2 textures.
Adds the interface and body changers to selected Vanilla followers : Housecarls, Companions, Hirelings, etc.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [heading] 
For those who only interesed in the body changer, this mod is replaced by
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47791/?] PS Universal Any Female NPC In-Game Body Changer [/url]
which allows any female NPC body to be changed by dialogue interface

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a [color=yellow] STANDALONE  mod [/color] with the [color=yellow] SkyUI MCM [/color] interface that allows the player to 
 configure [color=yellow] DAMAGE INTAKE and OUTPUT by MULTIPLIERS [/color] 
 and
 change the [color=yellow] BODY [/color] between [color=yellow] 5 MESHES with 2 TEXTURES  [/color] each
 and
 author hopes that this mod be the future [color=yellow] FRAMEWORK for OTHER MODDERS [/color]
 to give more adjustments that some of current follower mod does not cover.
 [/center] [/heading]

 [heading]This mod requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863/?] SkyUI [/url], [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender [/url], and  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888] BBP skeleton [/url] [/heading]
 
 [heading] As a working example, the current mod gives this tweak interface to following 10 vanilla followers : [/heading] 
 [list] [*] Housecarl Whiterun Lydia
 [*] Housecarl Solitude Jordis
 [*] Housecarl Riften Iona
 [*] Follower Mjoll
 [*] Follower Uthgerd
 [*] Hireling Jenassa
 [*] Companions Aela
 [*] Companions Njada
 [*] Companions Ria
 [*] College Member Brelyna
 [/list] 

 [heading] This mod does not change the face (HEAD) in any way, and must be loaded before any beautification mod applied to the any of the above characters listed. [/heading]

 [heading] With modifiable body meshes and textures : [/heading] 
 [list] [*] UNPB : Default, Real skin with muscle and sweat  (MeshSet0 : TextureSet0, TextureSetA)
 [*] CBBE : Default, Retexture with muscle and sweat  (MeshSet1 : TextureSet1, TextureSetB)
 [*] SevenBase : Default, Real skin with muscle and sweat  (MeshSet2 : TextureSet2, TextureSetC)
 [*] CHSBHC : Default, Retexture with muscle and sweat  (MeshSet3 : TextureSet3, TextureSetD)
 [*] ADEC : Default, Retexture with muscle and sweat  (MeshSet4 : TextureSet4, TextureSetE)
 [/list]  
 They are stored in directory : /[meshes OR textures]/actors/character/character assets/psBodyParts/
 Information is paranthesis are directory names for mesh : texture
 
 [heading] If you want to see the full implementation of this framework with extra check my other work : [/heading]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46823] PS Customizable UNIQUE Combat Companions with In-Game Body Changer [/url]
 [img] http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/46823-1-1384111862.jpg [/img]
 
 [heading] For modders who want to take their follower as base of this project : [/heading]
 Attack multipliers requires special perk and your mods don't use "Variable01 - 04" in your objectreference

 Character and body name registrations are done through the MCM Ski_configbase quest script which you should duplicate :

 All textures and meshes are registered with subfix : psBodyPart with M0-4 (meshes) T0-4 (textures) and TA-E (alternate textures)
 
 [heading] [color=yellow] Version History [/color] [/heading]
------ 1.00a - 2013/11/22 -----
  [list]
 [*] Initial release
 [/list]

 [*] CBBE Body Project : [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666] Link [/url]
 [*] SevenBase Body Project : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992] Link [/url]
 [*] CHSBHC Body Project : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888] Link [/url]
 [*] ADEC Body Project :  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5390/?] Link [/url]
 [*] Real Girls Realistic Body Texture UNP/UNPB/SevenBase : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=36425] Link [/url]
 [*] Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13377] Link [/url]
 [*] Sporty Sexy Sweat - Athletic muscle : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=28946] Link [/url]
 [*] CBBE skin retexture project : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554] Link [/url]
 [*] ADEC skin retexture project : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15721] Link [/url]
 [/list] 

 [heading] [color=yellow] Recommended mods to accompany this mod :  [/color] [/heading] 
 [list] [*] Amazing Follower Tweaks :  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?] Link [/url]
 [/list]
